snippet: Federal agents and local investigators this week served state grand jury subpoenas for records related to fund-raising to help Democratic candidates that year.
abstract: Federal inquiry into New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's campaign fund-raising operation expands to include efforts to raise money for Democratic candidates for State Senate in 2014; investigators are examining whether attempt was made to evade campaign contribution limits; authorities have given no indication that de Blasio is target of inquiry.
lead_paragraph: Federal agents and local investigators this week served state grand jury subpoenas for records related to fund-raising to help Democratic candidates that year.

headline.main: Inquiry of Mayor de Blasio Fund-Raising Extends to ’14 State Senate Races
headline.print_headline: Inquiry of de Blasio Fund-Raising Extends to ’14 State Senate Races
